name: Desktop Toys
description:
It's not a game, I swear! It's ... a ..... um..... presentation! 
Right, it's a presentation for a weird set of office tools that help us .... save .... money?

Um, sure.... I can show it for our next corporate meeting......

Desktop Toys runs on Windows 7 & 10.

You will need a mouse and keyboard to play it. And an escape key if your boss is walking towards you (sorry MBP owners).

Instructions: 1-5 to select mode, ESC to quit

I'm not responsible for any disciplinary actions resulting from getting caught playing this or trying to use a real hammer on your computer.
